item.title: Phoebe Bridgers and Bo Burnham kissing in the background of Keith Urban's TikTok at #TheErasTour.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
“Kill Bill” by SZA ties Whitney Houston’s “Exhale (Shoop Shoop)” and Olivia Rodrigo’s “good 4 u” for the most weeks at #2 among songs by female artists on the Hot 100 (11 each).
All three songs spent one week at #1.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: What’s your favorite song in the top 10 on this week’s Hot 100?
item.author: popcrave
popcrave

item.title: “Anti-Hero” extends its record as Taylor Swift’s longest-running top 10 hit on the Hot 100 (27 weeks).
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
“Favorite Song” by @Toosii2x reaches a new peak of #8 on the Hot 100.
It becomes his first top 10 hit.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: “Last Night” by Morgan Wallen spends a sixth week at #1 on the Hot 100.
item.author: popcrave
